name: MacBook Pro 14"
description: M3 Max chip with 36GB RAM and 1TB SSD. The powerhouse that handles everything from development to video editing without breaking a sweat.

name: Logitech MX Keys Mini
description: Minimalist Wireless Illuminated Keyboard. Compact design with comfortable typing experience and smart backlighting that adjusts to my environment.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S
description: Ergonomic mouse that fits perfectly in hand. Customizable buttons and smooth scrolling make navigation effortless during long work sessions.

name: Electric Standing Desk
description: Height-adjustable standing desk with memory presets. Switching between sitting and standing throughout the day keeps me energized and focused.
